revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Sealed Chamber |image = [[File:Sealed Chamber.png|270px]] |caption = A map of Sealed Chamber. |tokens = 36,000 |location = North of Route 134. }} '''Sealed Chamber''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 500,000 HP. == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=3|
N/A |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Tentacool.png|40px]] Tentacool |- |} ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat** || rowspan=4|
4,500,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=4|
N/A |- | [[File:Regirock.png|40px]] '''Regirock*''' |- | [[File:Regice.png|40px]] '''Regice*''' |- | [[File:Registeel.png|40px]] '''Registeel*''' |- |} '''*Note:''' Must have made progress in [[Questlines#The Three Golems|The Three Golems]] Questline to unlock.
'''**Note:''' After unlocking the Regi, Golbat will stop being a boss in this dungeon. ==Items== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Ochre Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 2.01% || 2.61% || 5.05% |- | {{Bag2|Diveball}} || N/A || 2.01% || 2.61% || 5.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Stone Plate}} || 2 || 0.28% || 0.46% || 1.15% |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || 2 || 0.28% || 0.46% || 1.15% |- | {{Bag2|Iron Plate}} || 2 || 0.28% || 0.46% || 1.15% |- | {{Bag2|Hard Stone}} || N/A || 0.14% || 0.23% || 0.58% |} After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic). {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Ochre Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | {{Bag2|Diveball}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Stone Plate}} || 2 || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || 2 || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Iron Plate}} || 2 || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Hard Stone}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.01% || 0.01% |} {{Hoenn Dungeons}} [[Category:Dungeons|^Region #3 - Hoenn^q]]
